Title: Lennox Declares Quarterly Dividend
Summary: DALLAS , Sept. 19, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Lennox (NYSE: LII) board of directors approved a quarterly cash dividend of $1.30 per share of common stock, payable October 15, 2025 , to stockholders of record as of September 30, 2025 .
